text: Hunters Point or Hunter's Point or Hunter Point refers to the following places: *Bayview-Hunters Point, San Francisco **Hunters Point Naval Shipyard, another name for the San Francisco Naval Shipyard *Hunters Point, Queens, New York City **Hunterspoint Avenue (LIRR station) **Hunters Point Avenue (IRT Flushing Line) * Hunter's Point, Quebec, an Indian settlement *Hunter Point (Washington)
title: Hunters Point
